actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to prohibit the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs from seeking deficiency judgments with respect to certain loan obligations held by him.

summary.text: Prohibits the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs from seeking deficiency judgments with respect to housing and real property loan obligations held by him.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to prohibit the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs from seeking deficiency judgments with respect to certain loan obligations held by him.
